name: Syuukun in Mirror World
description:
Overview


The game is a short walking simulator that explores a 3D space.
However, the controlling character is trapped in the Mirror World, and the player must control him from the real world to lead him to the goal.

The only obstacles in the way of walking are those that exist in the Mirror World.
Obstacles in the real world can be ignored. The player must successfully dodge invisible obstacles.

The controls are first-person, with only movement and the camera as the main controls.
No time limit or advanced action controls are required. Take your time and enjoy the exploration!

Game system

・Mirror
When you look into the mirror, you can see the world beyond.

・Button
When you press the button, the mirror appears at the current position.

・Goal
Touch the goal to advance to the next stage.
